#summary Lexicon of terms and abbreviations used in the plop code and docs

expression A program tree that is either an atom or a function application list, with a well-defined type. consisting of a list (with unshared nested conses, with a well-defined type. An expression may be in `S` format, `(f arg1 ... argN)`,  or `P` fo
exemplar A specific expression of interest.
knob An independent degree of freedom corresponding to some settings
addr
plop Probabilistic learning of programs.
moses Meta-optimizing semantic evolutionary search.
pnode
